Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: catfish51
Reviews.Content: This camera is great.It has a lot of functions and settings to choose from.The telephoto lens is powerful and the image stabilization works very well.It isn't as great as the top of the line cameras but for what it costs it does the job more than well.I'm very happy with it and using double A batteries makes it easy to keep it running no matter where you are.CATFISH

Reviews.Title: Canon
Reviews.Author: geraldine carter
Reviews.Content: Canon rules Again!  The camera is compact and provides very sharp pictures.  Image stabilization is another great feature.  I love this camer?

Reviews.Title: Beach Camera super fast shipping
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This combo pack is great value. only complaint is the cleaning fluid froze or was damaged when I opened up box. Nice micro fiber cloth though to clean camera lens. PowerShot SX160 IS is a fabulous camera for price, it comes with features that are normally available on cameras that will cost you hundreds of dollars more. Heres a link to Canon website great tech info and reviews [...]JUST BUY IT YOU WONT REGRET IT. MY WIFE LOVES THE RED color.Beach Camera is awesome Amazon partner. I placed order on Monday and got package on Friday afternoon! And it was free shipping!

Reviews.Title: great Christmas Present
Reviews.Author: Shawn George
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera it takes great pic's.  I have to admit I have been to busy to watch the DVD (it is the instruction book so to speak).I am know there is a lot of things I don't even know I can do with it yet, but I like it any way.It was nice to get the additional suplies with the camera that way I did not have to go spend more money to get them.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor, poor indoor.
Reviews.Author: Matthew Mitchell
Reviews.Content: Good outdoor camera. Indoors it is a bit slow and the flash drains the battery fast. I really do like the quality of photos. Make sure you have several changes of rechargeable batteries.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Nellwyn Barnes Sadler
Reviews.Content: Purchased this Canon Camera to take instead of my larger camera.  Have enjoyed the camera and the ease of downloading the pictures to my computer.  All of the additional bundle items are nice also.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot is great!
Reviews.Author: Trini
Reviews.Content: After a lot of research I decided to buy this camera. It is lightweight and takes beautifully clear pictures. Absolutely love it, no no complaints whatsoever!

Reviews.Title: I would return this if I could
Reviews.Author: Nana0013
Reviews.Content: I have had numerous canon cameras and have LOVED them all.  THIS ONE NOT!!!!  The flash takes forever to recycle and after each picture it flashes busy forever.  If you want to take pictures quickly in sequence this is NOT the camera for you.  Also, the pictures seem blurry on many of the images.  I have setting to auto hoping this would remedy the problem and many of the pictures are blurred.  I bought this to take pictures of my niece at graduation and my granddaughter's dance recital.  I am VERY disappointed.  Did not get any good pictures at either event.  Will look for another camera to take on my upcoming cruise, a throwaway digital has to be better quality than this.

Reviews.Title: 4 stars
Reviews.Author: Lynn M. Black
Reviews.Content: Takes very good pictures. But one thing they could inprove on is the slickness of the camera. It can slip out of your hand very easlly.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: janice kenney
Reviews.Content: Nice little camera Takes GREAT pictures  Very good deal I would highly recommend this camera to anyone looking for a nice point and shoot

Reviews.Title: Nice deal on quality camera with extras
Reviews.Author: Alan Williams
Reviews.Content: Received quick free standard shipping. I haven't messed with the camera a lot yet, but was taking great pictures on 'auto' right after setup. Seems to be a great camera with good zoom factor and good in low light. The accessories with it were good, 16MG memory card,  2 standard batteries, 4 rechargable batteries with charger, plus a little table-top tripod. Only problem was the charger for the rechargeable batteries did not work, but it is not made by Canon.

Reviews.Title: Cannon Powershot
Reviews.Author: Dennis C. Rabold
Reviews.Content: Very good clearity and easy to operate.  I do think it is a little pricy for the equipment that is recieved.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: arthur kopf
Reviews.Content: Camera offered more for the money: 16MP with 16x zoom, batteries with charger and lots more. Easy to use and like the image stabilizer. Pictures are excellent and easy to take. How can you go wrong after all it is a CANON.

Reviews.Title: A Lot for A Little
Reviews.Author: Katherine Hamilton
Reviews.Content: I love this handy little camera that does so much. I had considered getting a larger camera  but I injured my rotator cuff on my left shoulder and can only use one hand right now to take pictures. That poses a problem for someone taking Digital Photography classes in college. Thus this Powershot camera enables me to use one hand to take amazing photographs and keep from having to drop out of class!I did have a great laugh, however, when I pulled out the tripod and it is only 6" tall.This is one of the best buys i have made for college!

Reviews.Title: Good, easy pocket camera
Reviews.Author: 1BigBear
Reviews.Content: We have four higher-end Canon DSLRs and sometimes need a pocket camera. We also have a couple of the Canon PowerShot 580 compact cameras but decided to try this one as an upgrade and weren't disappointed. I carry one in a pocket just to have handy if changing lenses on a DSLR would result in missing a good shot, or if the shot just isn't important enough for a DSLR. Like"facebook" types of shots.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: tonia
Reviews.Content: So far I like it. Doesnt have as many options as some cameras but seems to be extremely durable and takes some fantastic pics. Would purchase again.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Kevin S. Tanner
Reviews.Content: I find this camera easy to use. It takes good pictures. I bought this camera to get an easy to use camera with a 16x zoom and that is what I recieved. I had no problem getting started with it. It was a good price and I am very pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Canon
Reviews.Author: Jenna
Reviews.Content: I was in desperate need for a camera, and this was the right spot at the right time bundle package

Reviews.Title: Best camera I've ever owned.
Reviews.Author: scrubbysue
Reviews.Content: I cannot get over the quality of pictures I'm able to capture with this camera. Not to mention how well the stabilizer works and what a deal with all the things included in this bundle. Couldn't be happier. Thank you so much!

Reviews.Title: digital PowerShot
Reviews.Author: kelly
Reviews.Content: So far I really like my camera.  I haven't even been able to try everything out yet.  The pictured seen very clear.  So far I'm very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Crappy Batteries
Reviews.Author: Julie Grosch
Reviews.Content: One of the reasons I purchased this camera is because it came with so many extra batteries, my mistake.  The camera is great, but the bonus rechargeable batteries never did charge so were totally useless.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot
Reviews.Author: lakota
Reviews.Content: Love the camera.It is very easy to use.It is fast and makes beautiful pictures.The zoom works great.I take lots of outdoor pictures. Airshows, things like that and the zoom works really well.It is easy to hold as well with the little bump on the right hand side.The screen is ample and big enough not to have to peer to hard.Very light ,very versatile.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: A C. Leblanc "A in Shelby"
Reviews.Content: I really like the WISWAG screen.  The camera takes excellent pictures under many conditions.  I like that it takes AA rechargeable batteries.  Canon's web site gave me very quick and excellent response to my concerns.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good value.  Carrying case far too small to be of value though.
Reviews.Author: Dane Slinkard
Reviews.Content: Pretty good value for the package.  However, the carrying case really doesn't fit the camera well, especially if you wanted to put anything else in it (such as spare batteries, the tripod, or such).

Reviews.Title: GOOD CAMERA
Reviews.Author: G.
Reviews.Content: BOUGHT 4 MY DAUGHTER SHE LOVED IT.GREAT PRICE AND COLOUR TO. TANX MON! O O O X X X X

Reviews.Title: Just right!
Reviews.Author: Kenneth A. Hirsch
Reviews.Content: Smaller than a SLR, bigger than a point and shoot, this is an excellent camera. The deal was great, as the extra memory card alone made it worth it.  Just what my wife wanted. She uses it all the time!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the $$$
Reviews.Author: Irish Matches
Reviews.Content: I received this camera the other day and love it so far, Flash charge and the pixels of the viewing screen are the only reasons this didn't get 5 stars from me, great for any occasion, video is great with no white noise.

ProductInfo.Name: Canon Powershot SX160 IS 16MP 16x Zoom Red Digital Camera 16GB Bundle
